mapper.insert: insert into Pds (title, userid, contents, fname1, fname2, fname3, fsize1, fsize2, fsize3, ftype1, ftype2, ftype3) values (#{title},#{userid},#{contents},#{fname1}, #{fname2},#{fname3},#{fsize1},#{fsize2}, #{fsize3},#{ftype1},#{ftype2},#{ftype3});
mapper.select: select pno, title, userid, regdate, thumbs, views from Pds order by pno desc limit #{startnum}, 10
